question: You took your family to a nearby restaurant. You were disappointed with the meal and wish to complain to the manager. Write a letter to the manager of the restaurant.In the letter:explain why you were at the restaurantdescribe the problemswrite about the action you want the manager to take
text: I’m writing this to make a complaint about a meal that I taste in your restaurant.
Last week, actually on the 5th I went to your restaurant with my family to celebrate my graduation day.
I ordered three medium Pepperoni Pizzas, three portions of Garlic bread to have as dine-in and two large Tandoori Masala Pizzas to take out.

To be honest, I was not quite happy with the meal we experienced. The taste of Pepperoni Pizza was somewhat awful, same as with Garlic bread. We all complained about this to the waitress, but nothing happened.

I was a regular customer of your restaurant. And I remember nothing like this. That was the main reason behind  having my party at your location. I would like to bring your attention to this matter immediately, and also I want you to take necessary action to prevent such things from happening in the future. If it is going to happen I am sure you are aware, that these things will affect badly on your brand name. It would be great if you can update me with the details of the procedures that you are going to take and the result of the necessary investigation.
I look forward to hearing from you.
